ygData.subject: Re: Questions about the Water Crystal Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Naeeldar  To:  Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 2:46 PM Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Questions about
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 2:46 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Questions about the Water Crystal Staff


> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh I hope you can get another glowing stein because I'm currently Level
34
> and I don't even carry a weapon anymore except for my Stilleto of the
> BloodClaw which I'm currently trying to sell. That intell from the stein
is
> so important, the staff while good is not very useful since you never
melee
> anymore it just doesn't happen. Anyway thought I'd throw in my 2 cents.

I agree, I rarely carry a weapon, I keep my bloodclaw around for killing
random aggo greens that I don't want to blow 100+ mana on to slaughter, and
I occasionally equip it while grouped to poke the mob in the back, but it's
mostly for show. Glowing stein and black tome all the way :) You just can't
argue with 176 intelligence.
